entry.title: Friday night Football
entry.summary: Through Rainbow Club (A swim club that I used to work for), I was offered tickets to see the Dragons vs. the Raiders at Win Stadium in Wollongong. Tonight, Nick and I caught the train to Wollongong, had a few beers and dinner at the Illawarra Brewing Co. and then headed to the stadium to watch the game.
entry.content:
Through Rainbow Club (A swim club that I used to work for), I was offered tickets to see the Dragons vs. the Raiders at Win Stadium in Wollongong. Tonight, Nick and I caught the train to Wollongong, had a few beers and dinner at the Illawarra Brewing Co. and then headed to the stadium to watch the game.

Our seats were not the best. The whole first half of the game, the ball was down the opposite end of the field (as Raiders had majority possession). I was excited for the second half, thinking that Raiders would be mostly down our end. HOwever, during the second half, Dragons had majority possession and scored at least 4 tries to make it almost even.

A few other families from Rainbow Club attended the match too. I got to catch up with them, which was really nice. I do miss the people at Rainbow Club. It's just a shame that I do not enjoy teaching anymore. THe thought of spending 3 hours in the cold, chlorinated pool does not make me feel good.

entry.title: History of carly.cool
entry.summary: We are live with the new website!
entry.content:
We are live with the new website!

Let's not forget how the homepage looked just yesterday!

entry.title: Roosters vs. Raiders NRL game
entry.content: Roosters vs. Raiders game. Nick's dad had 4 spare corporate box tickets. Nick invited Nathan and Emma to come with us.

entry.title: Back to reality
entry.content: Standard Monday workday. I feel too tired to go to the lab. I decided to work from home. All day, I have not done any thesis writing for my PhD , only updating my blog. I feel very nervous to go into the lab tomorrow. My supervisors want me to go to NZLD to do some lab work. After my trip to USA 2023, I don't want to go anywhere for the rest of the year. It is too windy to do any outside activities but I am feeling stressed from my lack of water time - swimming or paddling.

entry.title: Zayne's 1st birthday & Baptism
entry.summary: On this day, I arrived home from USA and headed straight to mum's to get ready for Zayne's First Birthday and Baptism.
entry.content:
On this day, I arrived home from USA and headed straight to mum's to get ready for Zayne's First Birthday and Baptism.

Zayne, my littlest love.

entry.title: Hardly working
entry.content: My day=trying to write but just cuddling with Chip.
